mapper.insert: insert into board(seq, id, name, email, subject, content, ref) values(seq_board.nextval, #{id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{subject}, #{content}, seq_board.currval)

choose.when: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select seq,id,name,email,subject,content,ref,lev,step,pseq,reply,hit,to_char(logtime, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as logtime from board order by ref desc, step asc)tt) where rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum}

select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select seq,id,name,email,subject,content,ref,lev,step,pseq,reply,hit,to_char(logtime, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as logtime from board where subject like '%'|| #{condition} ||'%' order by ref desc, step asc)tt) where rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum}

select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select seq,id,name,email,subject,content,ref,lev,step,pseq,reply,hit,to_char(logtime, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as logtime from board where id like '%'|| #{condition} ||'%' order by ref desc, step asc)tt) where rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum}
select count(*) from board where subject like '%'||#{condition}||'%'

update board set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, logtime=sysdate where seq=#{seq}
update board set step=step+1 where ref=#{ref} and step > #{step}
mapper.insert: insert into board(seq, id, name, email, subject, content, ref, lev, step, pseq) values(seq_board.nextval, #{id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{ref}, #{lev}, #{step}, #{pseq})
